text.text_translated:
There is a new idea called 'buy nothing'.
This idea is now on social media.
Some people on social media are influencers.
They usually share pictures of clothes and make-up.
They tell people to buy these things.

But now, some YouTube stars say something different.
They tell people not to buy anything.
They say to do this for a long time, like one year.

Two friends in Canada tried this for a year.
They only bought food.
For the first three months, they stopped buying some things.
They did not buy things that use electricity, clothes, or things for the house.

Next, they stopped paying for services.
For example, they did not get haircuts.
They did not eat in restaurants.
They did not buy gas for their cars.
In one year, they saved $55,000.
